programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI

The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Visitor. Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: The Big Squeak. Avocado's new toy is driving everyone crazy with its noisy squeaker.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Shadow Boxin'. Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been trapped with Tom its entire life, the shadow refuses to go back to the life it once had. But when the shadow becomes a total nuisance to Tom and Jerry, they team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Baby Blues. While Rick and Ginger are looking after their adorable niece for the weekend, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the kid safe while Ginger goes to the store. Taking his new job seriously, Spike swears that nothing will happen to the baby. Naturally, this is where Tom and Jerry arrive on the scene to wreak havoc and make Spike's babysitting job quite possibly be his last!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Meanie Genie. After the witches fly off into the night, Tom chases Jerry into a room full of enchanted bottles. When Jerry tries to hide in one, he inadvertently releases a mischievous thousand-year old genie who grants him three wishes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Flea Bitten. When Tom finds Butch taking a bath upstairs, he gives the alley cat the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around the tub isn't the only thing he's left behind. With the house now infested with fleas, Tom, Jerry and Spike declare war on the pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.desc: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Percy and the Skunks

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Dirty Rat. A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerry's home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Franky's a no-good, dirty rat. He doesn't play fair. He's a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks they're soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry-Geddon. Tuffy and Jerry are brushing their teeth. Tuffy's so tired he uses Jerry's tail instead of his toothbrush. They climb in their respective beds, only Tuffy's not in his bed, he's in the palm of Tom's hand that Tom's made-up to look like a bed. Tom gets walloped for his little stunt but it points out to Jerry that he needs a safer home. What begins with Jerry securing his home from Tom, turns into an arms race between the cat and mouse where they each build their own booby-trapped bunker to protect themselves from each other. They turn out to be their own greatest enemy, with the biggest threat coming from their own creations. In the end, they go back to their relatively safer existence.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tic-Tyke-D'oh. Spike hasn't been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spike's a sore loser. That's why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Tom's finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spike's right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just can't win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Missing in Traction. When Tom's hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, he's sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case they're working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, he's in traction and can't move. That's okay, he's got a partner in crime-solving – Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat-titude Adjustment. After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Tom's bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerry's loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Tom's affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Tom's animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildie's wand to reverse the spell, but it won't be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Funnel Face. When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Wing Nuts. Little Quacker is heartsick and he's come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quacker's honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and he's counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry aren't about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow. Tom's being unusually difficult when he's rocked by an epiphany-- HE'S LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that he's going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word – furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy ('nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerry's spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and it's about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.sub-title: Hunger Games. Tom is told he can't eat for 12 hours!
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Kitten Grifters. Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items they've taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they don't want to be separated!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Mock Me Not. Lucas playfully mimics Bodhi. But he may have offended her.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Jumping Pal. Lucas encounters a peculiar creature - A Jumping Bean.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Looneyburg Lights
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Visitor. Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Skiff Upon the Sea

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI

With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inventor. When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become ‘inventive’ himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost ‘a cleverness competition’, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Car Trouble. Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: House Sitting. Findley is nervous about taking care of House while Lucas is away.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Big Top Tom. After believing that Jerry has been eaten by a hungry bear cub, Tom must avoid the mama bear's wrath as he tries to retrieve his pal. Meanwhile, oblivious to Tom's plight, Jerry's enjoying the perks of circus life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Reward If Lost. After Jerry mocks up a "Reward If Found" poster for Tom with the address of a neighbor with a ferocious dog, some good Samaritans bring Tom "home." Now, Tom has to escape from the house with his nine lives intact before he's brought back again and again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Build-A-Beast. When Hildie and Beatie believe they've had a few of their things stolen, they employ a little magic to create Bog, the Cottage Beast. In order to prove that Bog is overkill, however, Tom and Jerry must confess to borrowing the "stolen" goods to beat up on each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tuffy's Big Adventure. When Tuffy and Tyke head out on their own big adventure into the snowy mountains during a family vacation, Tom catches the blame from Spike and Jerry for letting them go. But when all three set out on a rescue mission for the little ones, it's Tom, Jerry and Spike who'll need rescuing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Dragon Down the Holidays. Hildie sends Tom and Jerry into the woods to find a baby dragon who they befriend on their way home. But when Hildie tells them she plans on making the dragon into dinner, Tom and Jerry work together to save him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Slaphappy Birthday. It's Spike's birthday and he has been counting the days down. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special, but not this one. He has forgotten! Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires -- but don't worry, it ends happily.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: James and the Dragon

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inventor. When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become ‘inventive’ himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost ‘a cleverness competition’, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Car Trouble. Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Muddy Thomas

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Jerry Rigged. After yet another unsuccessful attempt to catch Jerry, Tom falls under the influence of a traveling cat salesman named Carver, who sells him a series of elaborate mousetraps, tricks and schemes. Setting out to dish up a "world of hurt" on Jerry, Tom only managed to injure himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Downton Tabby. In a post-Edwardian era, Tom lives in the basement of an impressive manor belonging to an aristocratic family. When the Butler asks him to rid the house of a troublesome mouse upstairs, he also promises him a life of comfort upstairs if he succeeds. Unfortunately for Tom, Jerry overheard the entire conversation, making Tom's opportunity all the more challenging.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Pillow Case. Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. When they find the dog with the help of a friendly bat, they discover the pup can't sleep without her special pillow. Now, for the sake of everyone's sleep, the great pillow case is on!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tail of Two Kitties. Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butch's tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until he's feeling better. Butch is finally getting what he's wanted, much to Tom's chagrin, especially now that Ginger's having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerry's getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Vanishing Creamed. Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm that'll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildie's recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. He'll use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesn't know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, it's his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Unhappily Harried After. It's Tom's wedding day! He's getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that we're experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it can't possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: In The Beginning. We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Ginger's house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesn't want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.sub-title: Splinter of Discontent. Tom & Jerry help Tyke with a splinter.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.sub-title: Out with the Old. Jerry thinks that Tom is going to be replaced.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inventor. When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become ‘inventive’ himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost ‘a cleverness competition’, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Car Trouble. Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Red Light, Green Light

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wheelers of Fortune. Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find that Rustle, the biggest and baddest Wheeler, has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact that his back wheel is broken. Dorothy brings Rustle to Smith & Tinker to fix his wheel. Overwhelmed with gratitude, Rustle helps them speedily repair the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends: The Mystery of Lookout Mountain
programme.desc: When cars go missing in the Mines, Thomas and Percy think they have a perfect adventure for the Biggest Adventure Club. But then they uncover that there was a similar problem at Lookout Mountain years ago. Thomas and friends set out to solve the two-headed mystery. Their search takes them under waterfalls, into unknown tunnels, new Crystal Caverns and ultimately brings the kids face to face with a mythical Mine Monster!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Round Tripped. If an injured Tom hasn't gotten better before Rick and Ginger leave for their weekend getaway, Tom will be forced to stay at the Jolly Friends Pet Oasis -- which is anything but jolly for Tom. Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom into doing anything but rest; after all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tough Luck Duck. Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he inadvertently walks under a ladder. When a series of unfortunate and painful incidents happen to Tom, Jerry and Spike, but not Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cheesy Ball Run. Tom, Jerry and Butch watch a Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs commercial and when they hear the words "Supplies are running out," the trio's rivalry reaches new heights as they compete to get what they imagine to be the very last bag of the snack food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Say Uncle. Jerry's Uncle Harry is coming for a visit. Tuffy's excited to meet the Great Uncle he has heard so much about. Harry craves a respite from his life as a nomad on the party cruise ship circuit, but it doesn't take him long to realize that life on the high seas has its advantages -- specifically, not being holed up with Tom!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Here Comes the Bribe. Toodles' folks are coming for a visit. The problem is, they think she's married with kittens. Tom happily plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their adorable kittens. Complications ensue when Toodles' dad doesn't take to Tom; her mom coddles Jerry and Tuffy a little too much; and Toodles' ex-boyfriend, Butch, learns that his girl "got hitched."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Crystal Cavern

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Dead Cat. Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Supertrolley. Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Magpie. When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Cat-Sitting. After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI
programme.desc: Thomas the Tank Engine is back on track in an all-new season of Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go! Deliveries will go awry, new areas of the island will be explored, and animals will end up in places they shouldn’t be…while Thomas and his friends grow from these unexpected surprises. Ashima returns from the Nilgiri Mountain Railway! Whiff tinkers in his Recycling Plant. Even Salty the Diesel Engine returns singing shanties from across the seas. The loc-amigos say “all aboard” to these familiar friends and debut character Bruno, the brake car. With brand new songs and bigger, better adventures, this season is bound to be a toot-ally awesome journey!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends XXVI

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Nia and the Ducks

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: To Kill a Mockingbird. A mockingbird has taken roost in a tree outside Ginger's window, where it sings the sweetest songs whenever she's around. When she leaves for work, however, the mockingbird earns its name by mocking Tom and Jerry relentlessly. When her nest full of eggs hatches and the insults really take flight, Tom, Jerry and even Spike, decide it's time for these birds to fly the coop!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Bringing Down the House. While Rick and Ginger are away, an overly ambitious young housesitter ruins Tom's plans to rule the roost. Of course, Jerry delights in Tom's predicament…until the sitter spots the mouse, and he becomes enemy numero uno!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Hiccup and Away. When Tom gets the hiccups, the witches decide that the only way to cure him is to scare him, so they banish him to the Wicked Forest of Very Scary Things. Unfortunately, there really isn't anything that frightening in, so they enlist Jerry to conjure up some scares – a task that he's only too happy to oblige, by taking full advantage of the situation.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: You Can't Handle the Tooth. When Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogre's tooth, they warn Tom and Jerry not to touch it. Naturally, they both try to get the other one to touch it, until they accidentally both touch it and discover it has greater powers than they ever could imagine. Now, neither of them want to let it go!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Pain for Sale. When Rick plans a big yard sale for the next morning, Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to find Tyke's first puppy collar in the gear before it's sold. Accidentally locked in the garage all night, Tom and Jerry end up battling with every yard sale toy, gadget, yard tool and houseware item at their disposal.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Return to Sender. When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few "dead ends."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Home Insecurity. After Rick and Ginger install a high-tech, state-of-the-art home security system, Tom and Jerry's shenanigans activate the home's automation system. Using the system against each other, they quickly lose control and the house shuts them down.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Tom-Fu. During one of their regular cat-and-mouse scraps, Tom is accidentally knocked out. When he awakens, he discovers that he's become a kung-fu master. It's now up to Jerry, Tuffy and Spike to reverse the process before they spend their lives getting Tom-Fu'd. If only someone could get near him...

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.desc: Hay, Now!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mirror Madness. Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's Magic Mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection that she gives up on all her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows. When Dorothy tries to recover the mirror, the mirror breaks and the "Reflection Beast" is released! To stop her reflection, Wilhelmina must do something "good" and looks to Dorothy to train her in the ways of goodness.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Everything's Coming Up Poppies. It's the Poppin' Poppies Parade and while making a float for Queen Ozma, Dorothy and her friends run out of poppies. When Wilhelmina gives them some of hers, it turns out they're the Wicked Witch's enchanted sleeping poppies, and Wilhelmina is planning to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers when she falls asleep. Now, it's up to Tin Man and Scarecrow to get help from the Good Witch Glinda before Wilhelmina steals Dorothy's slippers and all of Oz is put to sleep forever.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: A Cut Above the Rest. Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the big Oz Royal Ball, where all the Royals of Oz will meet. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the proper protocol, but luckily Patchwork Girl makes a magic dress that will help her! But when Wilhelmina's monkey minions, Frank and Lyman, sabotage the dress, the animated gown wreaks havoc, starting skirmishes between the royals. How will Dorothy manage to fix the Ball and show she was born to be a princess?

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wheelers of Fortune. Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find that Rustle, the biggest and baddest Wheeler, has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact that his back wheel is broken. Dorothy brings Rustle to Smith & Tinker to fix his wheel. Overwhelmed with gratitude, Rustle helps them speedily repair the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Sister Sister. Glinda the Good's twin sister, Melinda the Mean, plans to displace Glinda as the most loved witch in Oz. Melinda thinks that being good can't be hard. But when each of Melinda's "good" deeds shows her true colors, Dorothy and the gang figure out there is an imposter! Now, they not only have to find Glinda, but also prove to the Munchkins that she is the true Good Witch.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Policajné prípady
programme.desc: Taxík: Študenti Anna (20) a Adam (22) sa stanú obeťou násilníka, ktorý vnikne po zastavení do ich taxíku. Fyzicky napadne Adama a pokúsi sa ich okradnúť. Okoloidúca polícia okamžite zasiahne a násilnika zaistí. Po zistení, že taxík je kradnutý, sa naskytne otázka, či náhodou nedošlo k organizovanému zločinu. Falošný realiťák: Otec rodiny Hugo (34) uzavrel zmluvu s agentom pánom Tiborom Tancošom (26), ale keď prišiel do prenajatého bytu, bol už obsadený inou rodinou. Hugovi sa podarí dostať do sídla realitky, kde stretáva jej majiteľku – Tiborovu sestru Silviu (36). Silvia je bratovým činom šokovaná a nechápe prečo sa k falošnému obchodu uchýlil. Prípravok na chudnutie: Dôchodkyňa Milka (61) upodozrieva svojho partnera a zároveň fitness trénera Zola (27), že jej predal falošné prípravky na chudnutie za vysokú sumu. Zolo sa úspešne pred políciou bráni, až kým sa neobjaví účtovníčka Božena (58), ktorá tiež tvrdí, že je Zolová partnerka. Stali sa ženy obeťou podvoníka? Detský domov: Riaditeľ detského domova Matúš Valovič (54) nahlásil, že k ním prišiel dobrovoľne žiak Patrik (8) a domáha sa pobytu v ich domove. Polícii sa podarí zistiť, že Patrik ušiel z domu, pretože jeho matka Veronika (38) si našla nového priateľa Matúša (42). Čo zažil Patrik s novým otčímom, že sa rozhodol z domu utiecť?

programme.title: Grantchester V (3)
programme.desc: Viera v klam je zničujúca a slepá dôvera zatvára človeku oči pred pravdou. Will pri krste dieťaťa hovorí o význame vzťahu medzi deťmi a rodičmi, sám sa ale obáva, že sa ho matka zriekla. Geordie s Larrym medzitým zasahujú v miestnom kine Beaumont, kde hlásili vlámanie. Kino vedie charizmatický Wyatt Rogers, americký scenárista, ktorý v Anglicku našiel azyl pred prebiehajúcim honom na čarodejnice senátora McCarthyho. Údajné vlámanie sa nakoniec vysvetlí ako nedorozumenie, už čoskoro však bude musieť prísť polícia do kina znova a tentoraz už v ňom udrie smrť. Popri vyšetrovaní prípadu sa komplikuje aj situácia v domácnosti Keatingovcov a problémy sa nevyhnú ani pani Chapmanovej. Snáď iba Will prežíva chvíľky šťastia zo začínajúceho vzťahu s Ellie.

programme.title: Grantchester V (4)
programme.desc: Svet sa veľmi rýchlo mení a veda každým dňom posúva hranice nášho vedenia. Až to človeka nabáda k otázke, kde je pri tom všetkom Boh. Profesor experimentálnej psychológie Martin Adler napríklad tvrdí, že Boh sa nachádza v malej fľaštičke s podivuhodnou substanciou zvanou LSD. Ale poporiadku. V blate bolo nájdené mŕtve telo mladíka, ktorý večer predtým pobehoval nahý po meste a kričal, že ho prenasledujú mimozemšťania. Chris Hartley študoval psychológiu a podľa jeho profesorky Munroeovej sa zúčastnil Adlerovho výskumu, zaoberajúceho sa vplyvom halucinogénov na ľudskú psychiku. Adlerovi však žiadne LSD nechýba. Otázka teda znie, ako sa mladík k droge dostal a či si niekto mohol priať jeho smrť. Čo psychika dokáže, zisťuje Geordie tak povediac z prvej ruky, zatiaľ čo Will sa hneď z niekoľkých dôvodov stretáva s pocitom viny.

programme.title: Odložený prípad III (7/23)
programme.desc: III. 7 Náhodou je na školskom počítači nájdený výhražný list, adresovaný mladej spolumajiteľke firmy, ktorá vyradený počítač žiakom venovala. Podnikateľka nedávno zomrela na zlyhanie srdca a list vyvolá podozrenie, že zomrela násilnou smrťou.

programme.title: Odložený prípad III (8/23)
programme.desc: III. 8 Rodinné šťastie vojenského pilota, ktorý sa v auguste 1972 vrátil zo zajatia vo Vietname, netrvalo dlho. Za niekoľko mesiacov bol zastrelený na opustenej ceste.

programme.title: Odložený prípad III (9/24)
programme.desc: III. 9 Policajti nájdu na dne rieky kostrové pozostatky malého dieťaťa. Laboratórne vyšetrovanie odhalí, že išlo o malé dievčatko, ktoré niekto pred štyridsiatimi rokmi zabil. Uverejnený obrázok rekonštruovanej tváre prinesie nečakané prekvapenie ...

programme.title: Odložený prípad III (10/23)
programme.desc: III. 10 Za vraždu majiteľa lahôdkarstva bol odsúdený jeho zamestnanec, prisťahovalec z Mexika. Po štyroch rokoch sa ale na políciu obráti jeho brat a žiada o prešetrenie prípadu ...

programme.title: Odložený prípad III (11/24)
programme.desc: III. 11 Polícia dostane správu, že bola objavená svedkyňa vraždy z roku 1988. Pri streľbe na diaľnici bol vtedy zabitý mladý muž a hľadaná žena, ktorá s ním išla v aute, bola zranená ...

programme.title: Maigret a mŕtvy muž
programme.sub-title: Detektívny film VB (2016). V hlavnej úlohe R. Atkinson.
programme.desc: V jedno ráno zavolá na políciu znepokojený muž a pýta si Maigreta. Tvrdí, že ho niekto sleduje a chce ho zabiť. Skôr, ako sa Maigretovi podarí vyzistiť detaily, muž zavesí. Neskôr opäť telefonuje z rozličných miest až pokiaľ telefonáty neustanú. Tú noc sa nájde telo dobodané na smrť. Hnaný vinou, že sa mu nepodarilo zachrániť svojho "mŕtveho muža", Maigret je rozhodnutý nájsť vraha.

programme.title: Grantchester V (5)
programme.desc: Boxerský klub Vica Morgana, ktorý už vytiahol nejedného problémového mladíka z problémov, organizuje dobročinný zápas medzi Lukom Rawlingsom a Mattom Butlerom. Najmä druhý menovaný je pekné kvietok, Will ale nikdy nestratil vieru, že je to vnútri dobrý chlapec. Divácka účasť je viac ako uspokojivá, keď sa však borci po zápase neukážu, nájdu ich v zamknutej šatni oboch v bezvedomí, predávkovaných práškami. A zatiaľ čo v nemocnici bojujú o život, rozbieha sa pátranie, čo ich mohlo k tak zúfalému činu dohnať. Geordie má svoju teóriu, pravda je však oveľa komplikovanejšia a pre Willa doslova zničujúca.

programme.title: Grantchester V (6)
programme.desc: S Willom to ide po krachu boxerského klubu z kopca a podobne ako svojho času jeho predchodca Sidney Chambers, hľadá útechu na dne pohárika. Dokonca ho nezaujíma ani Geordieho nový prípad, inšpektor sa však nedá len tak odbiť. Na Kristovom poli bolo totiž nájdené telo dobodanej ženy, naaranžovanej do polohy ukrižovaného Ježiša. A aby tých čudností nebolo málo, mŕtva mala pri sebe svoj sobášny list. Podľa absencie krvných stôp je zrejmé, že zavraždená bola niekde inde a páchateľ voľbou miesta a polohou tela vysiela polícii nejaký odkaz. Taký je začiatok vyšetrovania, ktoré Willa prinúti pozrieť sebe samému do tváre. Otázka znie, kam ho ten pohľad zavedie.

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (17/18)
programme.desc: Na ulici je za záhadných okolností zastrelený mladý muž. Nikto netuší, odkiaľ vrah strieľal. Vyšetrovanie privedie detektívov až k mladíkovi, ktorý sa vplyvom mozgového nádoru považuje za vlkolaka ...

programme.title: Bostonské vraždy V (18/18)
programme.desc: 18 Pri vyšetrovaní vraždy tridsaťdeväťročného muža vypátrajú Jane s Maurou, že žil dvojitým životom ako bigamista ...

programme.title: Špecialisti IV (7)
programme.desc: V priehradnej nádrži je nájdené mŕtve telo mladého športovca, ktorého niekto zdrogoval a potom zhodil do vody zo žeriavu na bungee-jumping. Lukáš Panenka je "nasadený" medzi podozrivých dílerov drog a ocitá sa v ohrození života.

programme.title: Špecialisti IV (8)
programme.desc: Do Ústavu súdneho lekárstva je v noci privezené telo zadlženého podnikateľa v nehnuteľnostiach Romana Bedrnu, ktoré však do rána záhadne zmizne. Polícia má podozrenie, že bol podnikateľ zavraždený. Kam ale zmizlo jeho telo?

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles XIII (21)
programme.desc: Agenta Callena zajme Katya Miranovová. Tím NCIS musí čo najrýchlejšie nájsť, kde ho skrýva, a zachrániť ho.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles XIII (22)
programme.desc: Neznámy páchateľ vylúpil kasíno pomocou diaľkovo riadeného auta so zbraňami ukradnutými armáde. Kensi s Deeksom sa dozvedajú prekvapivú správu o adopcii a Callen s Annou sa snažia zbaviť spomienky na Katyu.

programme.title: Grantchester V (5)
programme.desc: Boxerský klub Vica Morgana, ktorý už vytiahol nejedného problémového mladíka z problémov, organizuje dobročinný zápas medzi Lukom Rawlingsom a Mattom Butlerom. Najmä druhý menovaný je pekné kvietok, Will ale nikdy nestratil vieru, že je to vnútri dobrý chlapec. Divácka účasť je viac ako uspokojivá, keď sa však borci po zápase neukážu, nájdu ich v zamknutej šatni oboch v bezvedomí, predávkovaných práškami.
